-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--ABFSS
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://newworld@azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://newworld@azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'



SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--ABFSS
-- This is auto-generated code

SELECT 
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) AS LocationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://newworld@azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



    

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID BIGINT,
         Borough varchar(30), 
         Zone varchar(60), 
         service_zone varchar(30)
    )
    AS [result]

 

 CREATE DATABASE NYC_TAXI;

 USE   NYC_TAXI;

 SELECT NAME, COLLATION_NAME FROM SYS.DATABASES
 


 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE NYC
 WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/nyc_green_taxi_data/taxi_zone.csv'
 )

EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE NYC

 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE NYC_BRONZE
 WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/nyc_green_taxi_data/'
 )

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE NYC


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'NYC_BRONZE',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID BIGINT,
         Borough varchar(30), 
         Zone varchar(60), 
         service_zone varchar(30)
    )
    AS [result]






    

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'NYC_BRONZE',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    AS trip_type
